name: The Great Chicken Escape
description:
A game for the 'One Button Game' Jam. My first ever game Jam.

It is controlled using one button (space). But for accessibility you can also use the mouse button, touchscreen or a game pad button.

It has only 2 short levels but they have very different game play, so make sure to check out both. Also there is a hidden Easter egg. Can you find it?

The HTML5 Version might have performance Issus and take a while to load. So please consider the download version for linux or windows (sorry no mac).

Thank you for playing! Please leave a comment and rating if you like the game :)

CHEATS:

Hey there, if you get stuck in level 1 because it is to difficult, you can press 0 (zero) and it will teleport you close to the end of level 1. Level 2 features different game play (but it might be even more difficult)
